channel.title: Some questions -.- can once someone anwer those?
channel.description:
1. how can i make my barrage that you will stand still for like 20 secs? same with entangle. tbh someone got the code for the bind? :p cause the seconds willnot work :S
2. how to chanse the max hit of range and melee?
3. How can i make it that the max stat is 99 and max cb 126? I can set it to 99 but than i m cb 185 :S help please :p
4. How can i stop massclicking or cant i stop that???
Please help me :wub:
and please tell me where most is in the client.java but where a search and than what i have to delete/add/edit

item.title: Some questions -.- can once someone anwer those?
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

for question 1, find for code:

public void iceBarrage() {

ull see this:

public void iceBarrage() {
iceBarrage = true;
iceTimer = 140;

change the icetimer to 200 for 20 seconds, easy,

For question 2, find for code: if (FightType == 5 || FightType == 6) {

ull see something like this:

if (FightType == 5 || FightType == 6) {
  // Accurate and Longranged
  MaxHit += (double)(1.07+(double)((double)(RngBonus*Range)*0.00100));
} else if (FightType == 7) {
  // Rapid
  MaxHit += (double)(1.4+(double)((double)(RngBonus)*0.00025));
}
//MaxHit += (double) (Range * 0.035);
playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit);

}

change the 1.7 and 1.4 to higher or lower hitting,

for question 3 find for code:

if (playerXP[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])]

ull see something like this:

            int level = 0;
            if (playerXP[Integer.parseInt(token3[0])] > 13004350) {
                level = 99;
            }

change the level to what cb lvl u want and the 13004350 to whatever u want,

then search for:

99, then ull see something like this:

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > 1300453)
return 99;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double)lvl+300.0*Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl/7.0));
output = (int)Math.floor(points/4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 0;
}

make return what lvl cmb u want, and the for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { is the lvls u gain, with the exp u added above it, so the:

if (exp > 1300453)

for question 4…i cant tell it lol…idk
